about_the_game:
Stunningly rendered for the first time in dazzling full color! Join us now for these treacherous tales of the dauntless Diesel Knights and their fearsome fighting machines!

Diesel Knights a 6-v-6, Mech/Movement Shooter set in a pulp-inspired, dieselpunk world. Players assume the role of the titular "Knights", brave gunwalker pilots of the 407th Special Armored Calvary Regiment, and engage in frenetic multiplayer combat both on foot, using advanced parkour movement mechanics and mid-century inspired weapons and gadgets, or in the cockpits of towering, 65-ton, diesel-powered, mechanical battle suits.

Utilize verticality and momentum to outmaneuver your opponents in all new first or third person multiplayer action or compete for the fastest time in the time trial mode.

Prototype playtest coming soon! Wishlist now!

content_descriptors.notes: This Game may contain content not appropriate for all ages, or may not be appropriate for viewing at work: Frequent Violence or Gore, General Mature Content

detailed_description:
Stunningly rendered for the first time in dazzling full color! Join us now for these treacherous tales of the dauntless Diesel Knights and their fearsome fighting machines!

Diesel Knights a 6-v-6, Mech/Movement Shooter set in a pulp-inspired, dieselpunk world. Players assume the role of the titular "Knights", brave gunwalker pilots of the 407th Special Armored Calvary Regiment, and engage in frenetic multiplayer combat both on foot, using advanced parkour movement mechanics and mid-century inspired weapons and gadgets, or in the cockpits of towering, 65-ton, diesel-powered, mechanical battle suits.

Utilize verticality and momentum to outmaneuver your opponents in all new first or third person multiplayer action or compete for the fastest time in the time trial mode.

Prototype playtest coming soon! Wishlist now!

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: macOS 10.14 (Mojave) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i5 (Quad Core) (currently untested on Apple Silicon)
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radeon R9 M295X 4 GB /Intel Iris Pro (low-end)
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS ARE ROUGH ESTIMATES ONLY, SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: macOS 10.15 (catalina) or later
  • Processor: Intel Core i7 (Quad Core or better)
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: AMD Radion Pro 560X or better
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS ARE ROUGH ESTIMATES ONLY, SUBJECT TO CHANGE.

name: Diesel Knights

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i5-2500k / AMD FX-6300
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 660 / AMD Radeon HD 7870 (2GB VRAM)
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 20 GB available space
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS ARE ROUGH ESTIMATES ONLY, SUBJECT TO CHANGE.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: OS 10/11 (64-Bit)
  • Processor: Intel Core i7-770 / AMD Ryzen 5 1600
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GTX 1060 (6GB) / AMD Radeon Rx 580 (8GB)
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 20 MB available space
  • VR Support: N/A
  • Additional Notes: SYSTEM REQUIREMENTS ARE ROUGH ESTIMATES ONLY, SUBJECT TO CHANGE.

short_description: Diesel Knights is a 6-v-6, Mech/Movement Shooter set in a pulp-inspired, dieselpunk world.
